A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The only word I can use to describe this film is pathetic. Being a life-long Star Wars fan\, it was disappointing to see such a gross disregard for the prequels (including \"The Force Awakens\").  The odd slapstick humor was cringe-worthy. The plot was jerky\, hard to follow\, preachy\, boring\, and left new characters severely underdeveloped.
